entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 08 January 2023
